title: Exception thrown when exporting data in a table inside a grid cell
description: While attempting to export data in a table that is located inside a grid cell, an exception is thrown. This issue occurs when performing the following steps:
OB: An exception is thrown when attempting to export data from a table within a grid cell.
EB: The software should allow the user to export data from a table within a grid cell without any exceptions or errors.
SR:
1. Open the application.
2. Insert a table into one of the grid cells.
3. Insert another table into a different grid cell.
4. Attempt to export data from the table within the grid cell where you inserted it. An exception should not be thrown during this process.
